product.name: LeadMap
product.description: A modern, AI-powered SaaS platform for real estate professionals to discover undervalued property leads with interactive maps, advanced filtering, and intelligent data enrichment.
product.tagline: The AI lead platform for faster, smarter closings

features.title: Property Lead Discovery
features.description: Find undervalued properties with price drop alerts. Our platform tracks properties across multiple sources and alerts you when prices drop, days on market increase, or listings expire.

features.title: Interactive Maps
features.description: Visualize leads on Google Maps with color-coded markers. Red for expired leads, blue for geo-sourced leads, green for enriched leads, and purple for default/probate leads.
variations: The map view is super handy! Red markers = expired listings (great opportunities), blue = geo-sourced leads, green = enriched with contact info, and purple = probate or default leads. Click any marker to see the property details.

Yeah, the map feature is pretty cool. Each color means something different - red dots are expired listings (those are gold mines), blue ones come from Google Places, green means we've enriched the contact info, and purple are probate leads.

The map uses color coding to help you spot opportunities fast. Red markers show expired listings (sellers might be frustrated), blue shows geo-sourced properties, green means we found owner contact info, and purple indicates probate or default situations.

features.title: Advanced Filtering
features.description: Filter leads by type (All, Expired, Probate, Geo, Enriched), price range, location, days on market, and more. Find exactly what you're looking for quickly.

features.title: AI-Powered Enrichment
features.description: Enrich leads with owner contact information including email and phone numbers. Each enrichment includes a confidence score so you know how reliable the data is.

features.title: Email Templates
features.description: Pre-built email templates for property owner outreach. Customize templates with property details, use AI-powered rewriting, and copy directly to your email client.

features.title: Pricing & Trials
features.description: Start with a 7-day free trial, no credit card required. After that, choose our Pro Plan at $150/month for unlimited leads and full access to all features.

features.title: Upgrade & Billing
features.description: Upgrading is simple! After your 7-day free trial ends, you can subscribe to the Pro Plan for $150/month. No long-term contracts, cancel anytime. You'll get unlimited leads, full enrichment access, email templates, and all premium features.
details: No credit card needed for trial
variations: To upgrade, just head to the pricing page after your trial ends. It's $150/month for the Pro Plan - no contracts, cancel whenever. You get unlimited leads, enrichment, templates, the whole shebang.

Upgrading's pretty straightforward. Once your free trial wraps up, you can jump on the Pro Plan for $150/month. Cancel anytime, no strings attached. Everything's included - unlimited leads, enrichment, email templates, maps, you name it.

After your 7-day trial, upgrading to Pro is $150/month. No credit card needed for the trial, and you can cancel the Pro plan anytime. It unlocks everything - unlimited leads, full enrichment, all the templates, and premium features.

features.title: Probate Leads
features.description: Access probate property leads with case numbers, decedent names, and filing dates. These properties often represent excellent opportunities for real estate professionals.

features.title: Expired Listings
features.description: Automatically detect and track expired listings. When a property disappears from active listings, we mark it as expired so you can reach out to frustrated sellers.

features.title: Geo-Sourced Leads
features.description: Discover leads from Google Places API integration. Find real estate agencies and properties based on geographic location and radius searches.

features.title: Dashboard & Analytics
features.description: Get insights into your lead pipeline with workspace analytics. Track active leads, expired leads, probate leads, and average enrichment confidence scores.

features.title: Admin Features
features.description: Upload leads via CSV, manage email templates, and handle probate lead imports. Full admin panel for managing your lead database.

features.title: Authentication
features.description: Secure authentication with email/password or OAuth providers (Google and Microsoft). Automatic profile creation and 7-day free trial assignment.

features.title: Dark Mode
features.description: Full dark mode support with persistent theme preference. Switch between light and dark themes with a single click.

common_questions.question: how do i get started
common_questions.answer: Getting started is easy! Sign up for a free account and you'll automatically get a 7-day free trial. Once you're in, you can start by exploring the dashboard, uploading your first CSV of leads, or checking out properties on the map. The onboarding checklist will guide you through the key features.

common_questions.question: what is leadmap
common_questions.answer: LeadMap is an AI-powered SaaS platform designed specifically for real estate professionals. We help you discover undervalued property leads through interactive maps, advanced filtering, and intelligent data enrichment. Think of us as your all-in-one tool for finding properties with price drops, expired listings, probate opportunities, and more.

common_questions.question: how much does it cost
common_questions.answer: We offer a 7-day free trial with no credit card required. After your trial, our Pro Plan is $150/month and includes unlimited leads and access to all features including enrichment, email templates, maps, and analytics.

common_questions.question: how do i upgrade
common_questions.answer: Upgrading is super simple! After your 7-day free trial ends, you can subscribe to the Pro Plan for $150/month. No credit card needed for the trial, and you can cancel the Pro plan anytime. Just head to the pricing page when you're ready.
variations: To upgrade, just go to the pricing page after your trial ends. It's $150/month for Pro - no contracts, cancel whenever. You get everything unlocked.

common_questions.question: what are the red dots on the map
common_questions.answer: Red markers on the map are expired listings - properties that were previously listed but have since been removed from active listings. These are often great opportunities because the sellers might be frustrated and more willing to negotiate. Click any red marker to see the property details.
variations: Those red dots? Those are expired listings - properties that dropped off active listings. Usually means frustrated sellers, which equals opportunity! Click one to see the details.
Red markers = expired listings. They fell off the active market, so sellers might be more open to deals. Click any red marker for property info.
The red dots are expired listings - properties that aren't actively listed anymore. Sellers might be frustrated, so these can be great opportunities. Click a marker to see details.

common_questions.question: how do i enrich leads
common_questions.answer: To enrich a lead, simply click the 'Enrich' button next to any property in the leads table. Our system will look up owner contact information including email and phone numbers. Each enrichment includes a confidence score so you know how reliable the data is. You can also enrich multiple leads at once.

common_questions.question: what are expired leads
common_questions.answer: Expired leads are properties that were previously listed but have since been removed from active listings. These represent great opportunities because the sellers may be frustrated and more willing to negotiate. We automatically detect when listings expire and mark them for you.

common_questions.question: how do i use email templates
common_questions.answer: Email templates make outreach easy! Click 'Generate Email' on any lead, select a template, and customize it with property details. You can use AI-powered rewriting to personalize the message, then copy it directly to your email client. Templates include tokens like {address} and {price} that automatically fill in property information.

common_questions.question: can i upload my own leads
common_questions.answer: Absolutely! If you're on a paid plan, you can access the admin panel and upload leads via CSV. Just make sure your CSV includes columns for address, city, state, zip, price, price_drop_percent, days_on_market, and url. We'll handle the rest and add them to your lead database.

common_questions.question: what data sources do you use
common_questions.answer: We aggregate leads from multiple sources including Redfin, Google Places, probate records, and more. Leads are automatically tracked and updated. You can see the source of each lead in the leads table, and we track metadata like geo_source and enrichment_source for transparency.

common_questions.question: what about the free trial
common_questions.answer: The free trial is 7 days, no credit card required. You get full access to all features during the trial. After that, it's $150/month for the Pro Plan if you want to continue. You can cancel anytime.
variations: 7-day free trial, no credit card needed. Full access to everything. After that, $150/month for Pro if you want to keep going. Cancel anytime.
Free trial's 7 days with no credit card required. You get all features unlocked. Then it's $150/month for Pro, but you can cancel whenever.
7-day trial, no credit card needed. Full access during trial. After that, Pro is $150/month - cancel anytime if you don't want to continue.
